https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/klmsgJ1gBsZSmeN7JbUcaBy1AAV.jpg Lupita and Toña work as housemaids at the Ruíz Palacio’s house, an aristocratic Mexican family. For a long time they have been mistreated and poorly paid. They’re now fed up with the abuse and lack of respect they get from their employers. Don't Air Your Dirty Laundry In Public
